detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#124-126)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#10)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#108-117)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#11)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#51-55)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#197-199)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#140)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#142)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/fmlink.sol#185-189)
